org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth

Class BluetoothLeProvider<T extends Data,S extends Data>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core.Provider<T,S>
      • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core.AndroidProvider<T,S>
        • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.BluetoothLeProvider<T,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the input data type
    S - the output data type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BluetoothLeNotifyProvider, BluetoothLeReadProvider, BluetoothLeWriteProvider

    public abstract class BluetoothLeProvider<T extends Data,S extends Data>
extends AndroidProvider<T,S>
    Base class for providers dealing with Bluetooth Low-Energy.
    Author:
    Riccardo Mancini

      private static int incrementAttachedBluetoothProviders()
      Increments the number of bluetooth providers attached to the BluetoothLeHandler instance.
      void onAttach()
      When the provider is attached to an ExecutionManager and if this is the first BluetoothLeProvider, sets the BluetoothLeHandler Context to the one of the ExecutionManager.
      void onDetach()
      When the provider is detached from an ExecutionManager and if this is the last BluetoothLeProvider, sets the BluetoothLeHandler Context to null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BluetoothLeProvider

        public BluetoothLeProvider(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt gatt,
                           java.util.UUID service,
                           java.util.UUID characteristic,
                           java.lang.Class<T> inputType,
                           java.lang.Class<S> outputType)
        Constructs a provider that handles callbacks for the given GATT server, service and characteristic.
        Parameters:
        gatt - the GATT server or null if all GATT servers should be selected.
        service - the service or null if all services in the given GATT server(s) should be selected.
        characteristic - the characteristic or null if all characteristics in the given service(s) should be selected.
        inputType - the type of the input data.
        outputType - the type of the output data.

      • onAttach

        public void onAttach()
        When the provider is attached to an ExecutionManager and if this is the first BluetoothLeProvider, sets the BluetoothLeHandler Context to the one of the ExecutionManager.
        Overrides:
        onAttach in class Provider<T extends Data,S extends Data>
        See Also:
        #attach(ExecutionManager, Store, Store)

      • onDetach

        public void onDetach()
        When the provider is detached from an ExecutionManager and if this is the last BluetoothLeProvider, sets the BluetoothLeHandler Context to null.
        Overrides:
        onDetach in class Provider<T extends Data,S extends Data>
        See Also:
        Provider.detach()

      • getHandledCharacteristic

        public BluetoothLeHandler.ServiceCharacteristicPair getHandledCharacteristic()
        Returns the BluetoothLeHandler.ServiceCharacteristicPair handled by this server.
